title: How would the teacher grade an essay in which the student wrote 2 capital I's and 2 tick marks (II') in place of every lowercase L (l)? - Quora

response.answer_text: How about the rest of the essay? What’s the name of the essay? Maybe it’s “Broken Keyboard” and II” is part of the student’s venture into experimental literature? What if the student is on the autistic spectrum? Should the teacher take this into account? What if the class is “Creative Writing and Rehabilitation.” Would that make a difference? Please provide more details.

Bro I reaII”II”y II”ike to write my II”etters II”ike this for fun! But if I actuaII”II”y wrote my II”etters II”ike this on my schooII” or coII”II”ege essay, my teacher wouII”d definiteII”y give me a faiII”ing grade and a zero for my whoII”e essay and probabII”y crumpII”e my essay, throw it in the trash, caII”II” or emaiII” my parents, and force me to rewrite the whoII”e essay with proper II”etters!!!!!!!
